trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the horror fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Stride
entries: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Medium or larger creature or object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Lashing Shadows {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The horror makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Glide
entries: The horror moves up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The horror targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of horror's next turn.
